data.meanings: he walked or went along, to strive/exert/labour/work, go quickly, effort, endeavour, hasten/act/run, be active, diligent, age of running or work and assist (child).
data.sentence: The word لِسَعْيِهَا comes from the root س ع ي and is associated with the meanings: he walked or went along, to strive/exert/labour/work, go quickly, effort, endeavour, hasten/act/run, be active, diligent, age of running or work and assist (child).

data.meanings: he was pleased/content/satisfied with him; regarded him with good will or favour or liked or approved him, choose/prefer, consent to, agreeable/acceptable, loved it, liked it, inclined to it, had a desire for it. ridzwanun - grace, acceptance, favour, that which is pleasing.. One who is responsible, accountable, or answerable, loving; a lover; or a friend, obeying, or obedient.
data.sentence: The word رَاضِيَةٌ comes from the root ر ض و and is associated with the meanings: he was pleased/content/satisfied with him; regarded him with good will or favour or liked or approved him, choose/prefer, consent to, agreeable/acceptable, loved it, liked it, inclined to it, had a desire for it. ridzwanun - grace, acceptance, favour, that which is pleasing.. One who is responsible, accountable, or answerable, loving; a lover; or a friend, obeying, or obedient.
